categories: Category:Bureau of Scouting and Exploration Services

nodes.text: A Nova Scout was a scout who had been inducted into the New Republic's Bureau of Scouting and Exploration Services' Nova Core. Talek Var was the youngest inductee into the Nova Scout "Hall of Fame," and also the first to be inducted posthumously. Burt Jaxton was a retired Nova Scout, and Ecclesis von der Agar was a decorated but befuddled member.
